text: Novosibirsk Metro Bridge is a metro bridge over the Ob River in Novosibirsk, Russia. It connects the stations Studencheskaya and Rechnoy Vokzal of the Leninskaya Line of the Novosibirsk Metro. It is the longest covered metro bridge in the world. ==History== Novosibirsk Metro Bridge was opened on 7 January 1986. ==External links== * Adventures awaiting tourists in Novosibirsk. title: Novosibirsk Metro Bridge
